column2: "What a coincidence that brings us together again! Coincidence? No, dare I say this is fate!"
"Allow me to clarify. Katori has been eagerly searching for you, to the point of jeopardizing our current mission."
"AHEM!! Since fate has brought us together, please listen intently to my Dual Blade introduction!"
"As their name suggests, my beloved weapon is equipped with both hands. Do not confuse these with Twin Daggers!"
"Their defining feature is simplicity. See? Even a novice like me can use them with ease."
"Acknowledging your inexperience is commendable, but refrain from using it when publicizing this class, please."
"With a bit of ingenuity, it is possible to produce a non-stop barrage of attacks."
"They might be simple, but by no means weak. With training, they can become a force to be reckoned with."
"Yes, yes! By all means, give Dual Blades a try!"
"And in time, I'm sure you'll be able to teach me a thing or two!"
"...since you are clearly so anxious to remedy your lack of skill, Katori, time for more training."
"Huh? Wh- I, Uh. No, that wasn't my--!"
"S-Saga!! Don't you know when to tell a joke? You're being too serious!!"
